name: Corn's Toasty Day
description:
Corn's toasty day is a small warm up project made in the Godot engine to learn and practice for larger projects in the future. It is a simple arcade-style game where you must avoid increasingly difficult obstacles to try and get the highest score possible.

The game runs on Windows, Linux, and in the browser. It will most likely not receive future updates unless any game-breaking bugs are discovered.

Font used: Luckiest Guy

Some sound effects by Kenny
